rk.Sometimes, when we are upset, we talk to: Obumwe, kutukubihirirwa, tuganiira nabamdi aha bizibu byeitu okutunga amagyezi nokuhagyira.
rk.But other times it is helpful to listen: Kwonka obumwe nikyiyamba okuhulikiriza no'okuhagyira abandi. Kutukuteka amaani gaitu omukwetekatekaho, nikyituyamba okuhurira kurungi.
rk.To do this, one makes an effort to give: Okukora ekyi, omuntu nafuba akuhayo okukyira okutwara, okuhurikyiriza okukyira okugamba, okuhayo ebiteekateko ebirungi okukyira ebibi, okureta amashemererwa okukyira okwemurugunya.
rk.It is an exercise that can impact our ow: Enkora nebaasa kwijya kukwata aha magara gaitu, ahamwe n'abo abatwetoraire
rk.Learning your triggers and avoiding them: Okwega ebirikukuretera embeera egyo no'okugyehara nikyibasa okutwara okutekyereza aha kugumisiriza, okuteekateka okuzuula n'kwega engyeri y'kwehara oba okuzikwasaganya. Ebimwe aha birikukyira kuretera embeera egyo harimu.
rk.Doing acts of service which can be descr: Okukora ebikorwa by’obuhereza ebiri kubasa kushobororwa nka okokorera omuntu ondaijyo ekintu kyori kumanya ngu yakukyikunzire, nikibasa kuba kirungi kandi ekyamani aha mbeera namagara marungi.
rk.Pick one service goal to complete in the: Ronda ekiruubirirwa ky’obuheereza kimwe ekyorikuza kumaririza omu naaku zirikwijja. Okuyamba omuntu oba ekibiina okugasirwa omu magara gawe.
rk.Carry groceries for an elder or mother w: Oyekorere ebyo’okurya by’omukaikuru oba maama wa’abaana abato
rk.Volunteer at your church/mosque: Okukora kutari kwokushashurwa aha kaanisa yawe oba omuzikiti

rk.Wash up the plates and cups after a meal: Yozya amasowaani n’ebikopo waheza kurya otashabirwe
rk.Wash/iron your parents or siblings’ clot: Yozya/ogorore ebijwaro bya bazaire oba bagyenzi bawe ahaaka
rk.Making friends or getting to know other: Rondaho ekirubirirwa kimwe kyarukundo kandi ogyezeho okwenyigira omu murimo egiri kugaita hamwe abantu omubiiro ebirikwijja
rk.Try to build your social community in sm: Gyezaho okwobenka social omu mitendera emikye  gumwe aha gumwe.
rk.Spend time with a special family member,: Twara obwire n'omuntu ow'omuhendo omu maka, munywani wawe, mugyenzi wawe ahi shomero, oba omuntu okuruga omu kkanisa/omuzikiti oba ekibiina ky'okushaba. Obumwe nobaasa kushanga abantu okuruga omu bibiina ebikuhagira obulwaire bw'okushanyarara, nka okuraba omu kibiina ekirikuhagira obulwaire bw'okusannyarara okwa Epilepsy Support Association of Uganda oba Purple Bench
rk.Positive affirmations are positive state: Ebikakaso Ebirungi (Positive affirmations) ne bigambo birungi ebyori kwegambira nkomuntu okukuyamba okwijuka ebirabo byawe, nemigisha egyo. Rondaho oby'okola ebyamani buri kasheshe n'ekiro okumara ennaku 3

rk.ACE Uganda built the EPILEPSY SMART app: ACE Uganda ekombeeka app ya EPILEPSY SMART eri app ya bushya. EMPEEREZA egi nehebwa aba ACE Uganda ahari busha kandi negyenderwamu okukozesebwa nko kweri
rk.This page is used to inform visitors reg: Ekitundu eki nekikozesebwa okumanyisa abagenyi ebirikukwata aha nkora yangye n'okukung'aanya, okukozesa, n'okushurura Amahulire g'Omuntu namunoonga habaaho ashazireho okukozesa Empeereza yangye
rk.If you choose to use our Service, then y: Waba oshazireho okukozesa Empeereza yaittu, oba okwikyirizza okukung'aanya n'okukozesa amahulire agarikukwata aha nkola egyi. Ebirikukwata aha Muntu nibyo turi kukungaanya okokozesebwa aha n’okurongoosa Empeereza. Tuturi kuza kukozesa oba kugabana erikukwata aha muntu wenna okwihaho nka oku bashoborire omu Nkora yaittu eye'ebyama
rk.The terms used in this Privacy Policy ha: Ebigambo ebirikukozesebwa omu Nkora egyi ey'Ebyama byine amakuru gmwe nka agomu Mateeka n'Obukwakkurizo bwaitu, ebirikufunwa aha EPILEPSY SMART app okwihaho kyaba kirambikirwe omu Enkora yaittu ey'Ebyama
rk.For a better experience, while using our: 'Okubaasa okufuna obumanyirivu burungi, ori kukozesa Empeereza yaittu, nitubaasa okukwetemngyesa okutuha ebirikukwata aha muntu ebimwe, ahabimwe kwonka bitarikukoma ahamaziina, endagyiriro ya email, okukwatagana n'essimu. Amahulire gi turi kushaba nigaijja kukuumibwa aha kyuma kyawe era tituri kuvunanyizibwa omungyeri yona
rk.The app does use third-party services th: App egyi nekozesebwa empeereza y'abantu abakashatu ezirikurangyirra Ebiragiro n'Obukwakkurizo bwazo
rk.We want to inform you that whenever you: Nitwenda kukumanyisa  iwe nti buri bw’okkukozesa Empeereza yaittu, omu mbeera y’enshobi omu app nitukung’aanya data n’amahulire (turi kuraba omu bintu eby’akashatu) aha ssimu yawe ekwetwa “Log Data. “Log Data” egyi  nebaasa okubamu amahurire nka endagyiriro ya Internet Protocol (“IP”) y’ekyuma ekyo, eiziina ly’ekyuma, ebinduuka y’enkora y’emirimu, ensengyeka ya app wa nokozesa Empeereza yangye, esshaaha n’eizooba ly’okozesa Empeereza, n’ebibaro ebindi.
rk.Cookies are files with a small amount of: Kuki ni fayiro ezinne obubaka bukye oburikukyira kukozesebwa nk'ebirikumanyisa eby'enjawuro ebitari bya maziina.' Ebi nibiherezebwa aha bbulawuzi yawe okuruga aha mikutu yempuliziganya eyorikuzaho kandi birikubikwa aha ijjuka ey’ebyuma byo
rk.This Service does not use these “cookies: Empeereza egy tekukozesa “kuki” ezi omu buramburukufu. Kwonka, app nebaasa kukozesa koodi z’abantu bakashatu n’amaterekyero g’ebitabo agarikozesa “kuki” okukung’aanya amahulire n’okurongoosa empeereza yaabo. Oyine eky’okukora okukwikiriza oba okwanga kukisi ezi kandi omanye ryari kukisi obuziri kusindikwa aha kyuma kyawe. Washalaho  okwanga kukisi zaittu, nobasa obutabasa kukozesa bitundu bimwe aha Mpeereza egyi.
rk.We may employ third-party companies and: Nitubasa  okukozesa kkampuni ez'akushatu n'abantu bamwe aha bwenshonga ezi ahansi okurahukyiriza Empeereza yaittu
rk.To facilitate our Service: Nitubasa  okukozesa kkampuni ez'akushatu n'abantu bamwe aha bwenshonga ezi ahansi okurahukyiriza Empeereza yaittu

rk.To assist us in analyzing how our Servic: Okutunga Ebirikukwata aha Mpeereza yaabo. Enshonga eri ngu okukora emirimo egyabaheebwa aha bwaitu. Kwonka, nibavunaanyizibwa obutoreka oba okukozesa amahulire ago olw'ekigendererwa ekindi kyonna
rk.We want to inform users of this Service: Nitwenda okumanyisa abakozesa be Empeereza egyi ngu abantu aba kashatu nibabasa okutunga Ebirikukwata aha Mpeereza yaabo. Enshonga eri ngu okukora emirimo egyabaheebwa aha bwaitu. Kwonka, nibavunaanyizibwa obutoreka oba okukozesa amahulire ago olw'ekigendererwa ekindi kyonna
rk.We value your trust in providing us your: Nitutwara obwesigwa bwawe omu kutuha Ebirikukwata aha Muntu nkebyomuhendo, nikwe tutyo turi okufuba okukozesa engyeri eziri kwikirizibwa omu by’obushubuzi ez’okugikuuma. Kwonka ijjuka ngu tehariho ngyeri yonna ya yonna eyo kutambuza aha yintaneeti, oba enkora y’okubiika eby’amashannyalaze eriho obukuumi 100% era ekwesigwa, kandi tituri kubasa kukakasa bukuumi bwayo buhweireyo
rk.This Service may contain links to other: Empeereza egyi nebasa okubaamu enkoragana n’emikutu endijo. wa’nyiga aha link y’omuntu ow’akushatu, noijja kuragirwa aha mikutu ogwe. Oyetegyereze ngu emikutu egyi egy'aheru terikwirukaniza itwe.
rk.These Services do not address anyone und: Empeereza ezi tezirikukora aha muntu wenna ali ahansi yemyaka 13. Titurikung’aanya mu bumanyirivu ebirikukwata aha muntu okuruga omu baana abali ahansi y’emyaka 13. Omu mbeera gye twakizula ngu omwana atali ahansi yemyaka 13 yampa ebirikukwata aha muntu, eki nitukyishazamu mangu aha seeva zaittu
rk.The owners of this application may updat: Bakama be nkora egyi  nabasa okulongoosa Enkola yaittu ey’Ebyama buri bwanyuma yo bwire. rk.This policy is effective as of 2023-01-0: Enkora egyi yatandika okukora okuruga omu 2023-01-04

rk.Name: Eiziina
rk.Updating you information will log you ou: Okugaruza busya amahulire gawe nikiza kwekora kyonka
rk.By downloading or using the app, these t: Wahanura oba waba okozesa app, ebiragiro ebi nibyija kukukwatako omu ngeri etari imwe oyine okukasa ngu nobishoma kurungi otakakozeise app. Tokkwikirizibwa kukoppa, oba kuhindura app, ekyikweka kyonna ekya app, oba obubonero bwaitu obw'obushuubuzi omu ngyeri yonna. Tokkwikirizibwa kugyezaaho kwiha source code ya app, kandi tiyine kugyezaaho kuvvuunula app omu nnimi ezindi, oba okukora derivative versions. App yennyini, n'obubonero bwonna obw'obushuubuzi
rk.ACE Uganda is committed to ensuring that: ACE Uganda eyehileyo okureeba ngu app egyi yaba eyo mugasho kandi yakora kurungi nka okukiri kubasika. Nahabwekyo, twine eddembe okukora empidukahinduka omu app oba okushashuza aha mpereeza yayo, obwire bwona kandi olwenshonga yonna. Tituri kuza kushashuza sente za app oba empereeza zaayo tutakumanyisize kurungi munongo nikyi kyonyini ekyori kushashurira
rk.The EPILEPSY SMART app stores and proces: App ya EPILEPSY SMART nebika kandi n'ekora aha birikukwataho  ebyokuba otuhaire, okubasa okuha Empeereza yaayo. Nobuvunaanyizibwa bwawe okukuuma essimu yawe n’okutaha omu app kandi birikubikwa kurungi. N’ahabwekyo nitushaba oreme kushisha esiimu yawe, kuba egyi niyo nkora eyo kwihaho obukwakkulizo bw’enkora n’obukwakkurizo bukutekwaho enkora entongore ey’emirimu gy’ekyuma kyawe. Nikyibasa kuhindura essimu yawe okubeera omu burabe okuruga omu bulumbaganyi / ebihuka/ enkora endijyo embi, okukosa eby'okwerinda by'essimu yawe kandi nikibasa kumanyisa ngu EPILEPSY SMART app tekuuza kukora kurungi oba n'obutakoreraho kimwe
rk.You should be aware that there are certa: Oyine kukyimanya ngu hariho ebintu ebimwe ACE Uganda ebyetari kuvunnanyizibwaho. Emirimo emwe eya app naija kwetengyesa app okuba n’omukutu gwa yintaneeti ogurikukoora. Omukutu ni gubasa kuba ogwo kutwatira hare ( Wi-Fi) oba guri kuhebwa omukutu gwawe ogwa ha ssimu, kwonka ACE Uganda terikubasa kutwara buvunanyizibwa aha app egi aha bwobutakora omubwijwire waba otaine Wi-Fi, kandi noba otaine bubaka bw’orikusigazaho
rk.If you’re using the app outside of an ar: Waba nokozessa app aheru ye’kitundu ekirimu WI-FI, oyine kwijjuka ebiragyiro by’endagaano byomukutu gwawe ogwesimmu nibikora. Nahabwkyo, nobaasa kwetenga kushashura omukutu gwessimmu egyo olw’omuhendo gw’obubaka okumara obwaire bworamare nokozessa app, oba sente ezindi ez’omunto wakashatu. Omu kukozessa app, noba noyikiriza obuvunanyizibwa aha bishare byonna byengyeri egyo, omuri n’ebishare by’obubaka omu kutambuza obubaka waba nokozessa app aheru yekikweka kyawe (nka ekikweka oba ensi) otihireho entambuuza yo bubaka. Waba otari iwe ari kushashura ebishare by’essiimmu okuri app, ninshaba omanye ngu itwe nitukyitwara ngu offunire olukusa okuruga ogwe ari kushashura ssente aha’bwokukozesa app
rk.Along the same lines, ACE Uganda cannot: Omungyeri niyo emwe, ACE Uganda teri kwijja kutwara obuvunanyizibwa omungyeri yori kukozessamu app katugire (i.e) oyine okukakasa ngu ekyuma kyawe nikyisigara kikyagyingire- nk’eryanda ryahwaho kandi tokubassa kugikozessa  mirimu ACE Uganda tekubassa kwikiriza obuvunanyizibwa.
rk.With respect to ACE Uganda’s responsibil: Omumgyeri niyo emwe, obuvunanyizibwa bwa ACE Uganda aha nkozessa yawe eya app, waba nokozessa app, nikikuru okwijuka ngu yadde nitufuuba okureeba ngu netereezebwa kandi ehikyire buuri bwaire, nitwegaama aha muntu wakashatu (third party) okutuha amahulire tubasse okugakwihistyaho. ACE Uganda tekwikiriza buvunanyizibwa bwonna aha kuferwa kwonna, okubagye oba obutaba gye bwonna oburi kuruga aha kwesigamara kimwe aha nkora ya app
rk.At some point, we may wish to update the: Obwiire obumwe, nitubasa kutumbula app. Omu bwaire obu app egyi eri aha android-ebyetengo by’ enkora egyi (naha nkora zonna ez’okwongyeraho ezi turi kusharaho okuhagusya okuberaho kwa app egyi) nibibaasa kuhinduka, kandi noijja kwetenga okuhanura ebisya waba noyenda kusigara nokozessa app. ACE Uganda teerikuraganisa ngu nekuuba nelongosa app egyi burijjo okubaasa kuuba eyomugasho, kandi/oba ekore n’enkora ya Android eyorabbe otaire aha siimu yawe. Wabura burijjo noyetengwa okwikiriza ebisya aha nkora egyi byakuhebwa. Kandi nitibaasa kwenda okuhendera okuha app, kandi nitubaasa kugyikomya okugikozessa omubwaire bwona tutakuhaire kihandiko kyo kugyikomya. Okwihaho haba hariho embeera endijjo, aha kukomya kwonna eddembe na layisinsi ezikuhairwe omu mateeka aga nibihwaho oyine kulekyeraho okukozessa app, kandi (kya nikyetengyesebwa) okwihisamu aha kyuma kyawe
rk.We may update our Terms and Conditions f: Nitubasa okulongoosa Endagiro n’obukwakkulizo bwaitu buli bwanyuma yobwire butari bumwe. Nahabwekyo, nohebwa amagyezi okwetegyereza omuko ogu bwanyuma yo bwiire okureeba oba hariho epindukahinduka yonna. Nitwijja kumanyisa aha mpidukahinduka yonna twaba nituteka Endagiro n’Obukwakkulizo obusya aha mukutu ogu
rk.These terms and conditions are effective: Endagiro n’obukwakkulizo obu nibitandika okukora okuruga 2023-01-04
rk.If you have any questions or suggestions: Kworabe oyine ekibuuzo kyonna oba ekiteeso kyonna aha Mateeka n’bukwakkulizo bawaitu, gyira omubwangu okutwihikyirira ho
rk.The race may be long but you are stronge: Orugyendo nirubasa kuba ruringwa, kwonka oryo wamani okukyira okwori kwemanya.
rk.Compare yourself to who you were yesterd: Orugyendo nirubasa kuba ruringwa, kwonka oryo wamani okukyira okwori kwemanya.
rk.So many people are afraid of failure, wh: Abantu bingyi niberarikyirira okugwa, okukyira okweijustya.
rk.The view is beautiful from the top, but: Ohori kurebera niharungi waba oryahiguru, kwonka hariho oburungi omukutemba. Otakyirabyamu amaisho.
rk.Discipline will take you places where mo: Emikwe naija kukutwara omumya minji ahi okuba namani kitara kutware.
rk.You get tested the most when you're abou: Nokyira kugyezesebwa munonga waba  ori haihi kwihika aha kintu kistsya, nahabwekyo otahwa amaani.
rk.Negativity is a choice. What are you cho: Okuhurira kubi nokusharaho kwawe. Nenkyi ekyori kurondaho?
rk.What we fear doing is usually what we ne: Ebi turi kutina kukora nibyo trui kwetenga kukoora munonga.
rk.If you cannot do great things, do small: Waba otarikubasa kukoora ebintu byomuhendo, kora ebintu bikye omungyeri yo muringo.
rk.Life and nature show us you have to get: Amagara ne ensi nibitworeka ngu oine kureka enyuma omuyaga okutaha omukashana omumisho.
rk.Trade your expectations for appreciation: Ramuza ebyoine mu amatsiko no kusiima.
rk.Life doesn’t get better by chance it get: Amagara tigari kubaho kurungi aha bwo mugisha kwonka aha bwebyo ebyori kukora.
rk.There is no right time, just time, and w: Tahariho bwire bwihikire, no bwire kwonka kandi nekyo ekyori kukora.
rk.The enemy wouldn’t be attacking you so h: Omubi takukurwanise munonga kuri hatariho ekyamani ekyo mugasho ekyoine. Abashuma tibari kwiba mubifurukwa.
rk.Delayed does not mean denied it just mea: Okukyererwa tikyiri kumanyisa kwimwa, nikyimanyisa ngu nyine kurindaho munonga kandi no kukora munonga.
rk.Most people who are criticizing and judg: Abantu bingyi abari kuntwariza kubi nokundamura tibakagyerizeho ebingyerizeho.
rk.There's a version of yourself that you h: Hariho omuntu oryomuriiwe, owotakarebire. Guma noija mpaka mwembi obumuryesherura.
rk.Can you fight off the old you long enoug: Nobasa kulwanisa iwe omukuru okubasa kumanya iwe omustya.
rk.It's impossible to stay at the same leve: Kigumire okusigara aha level niyo emwe waba nogyeza ho.
rk.Remember that trying is 80% of doing som: Oyijukye ngu okugyezaho kuri 80% eyo kubaho ekyi wakora. Naha bwekyo jyeza ho, kandi otahanika ahabwokuba obuatahanika niyo 20%.
rk.Try something new! If you win you'll be: Gyeza ho ekintu kistya! Wahangura noza kushemererwa kandi waremwa noza kuba omugyezi.
rk.The person who struggles is better than: Omuntu ari kugyezaho nakyira Atari kugyeza ho.
rk.Not every door that's closed is locked,: Tiburi rwigyi rukyingyire ngu rukyingire, rusindike rweyigure.
rk.How you do one thing is how you do every: Okworikukora ekintu kimwe nikwe orikukora byona.
rk.Sometimes we are so focused on the futur: Obwire obwingi nituburira omubitekateko byomumisho okwebwa ngu eirizooba nibyo biro byo mumisho ebitwa shabirire.
rk.The move that you're afraid to make coul: Ekyo ekyorikutina nikyibasa kuhindura buri kimwe.
Buri runaku nitutaha omurutaro rustya. iwe vs. iwe. Otayebwa ngu oryomuhanguzi burijyo.
rk.Happiness comes from solving your proble: Okushemererwa nikuruga omukumaraho ebizibu wabura obutabyiruka.
rk.If you can't do the small things right n: Waba otari kubasa kukora ebintu bikye…..notekateka kukora ota ebintu bihango omumisho.
rk.Stop worrying you'll figure it out like: Reka kwerarikirira noza kumanya okworakyikore nka burijyo.
rk.Life is like a bicycle. To keep your bal: Amagara garinka egari. Okuguma ahabigyere byawe oine kuguma notambura.
rk.Motivation is what gets you started habi: Okuba namani nikyo Kiri kuretera okutandika, emize na emichwe nibyo bikuturetera kugyenda omumisho.
rk.Don't be the one thing standing in your: Otaba iwe ayemerire omu muhanda gwawe.
rk.Sometimes things don't go your way or as: Obwire obumwe ebintu tibiri kugyenda mungyeri yawe oba omuntekateka yawe. Ebintu nibibasa kuhinduka, oba kushazibwamu, oba okushazibwamu. Kora ekyori kubaasa okugarukamu, kwonka okyikore.
rk.Strive for progress, not perfection: Rwanira okugyenda omumeisho, kwonka otarwanira kuba abilities.
rk.It’s okay to struggle, it’s not okay to: Tikyine nshonga yona okufuba, kwonka nikyibi okurekyeraho.
rk.The most important skill in life is lear: Omuriimu gwomugasho ogurikukyirayo kwetengwa nokwega kukora ebintu omubwire obwokuba otarikuhurira nka arikwenda kubikora. Buryomwe nabasa kubikora byaba byorobi nanokurekyeraho byaguma.
rk.Every overnight success has been years i: Buri buhanguzi bukaba buriho emyaka yona.
rk.Sometimes when you're in a dark place yo: Obumwe waba ori omumwanya gwo mwirima, notekateka ozikyirwe kwonka maziima noba osimbirwe.
rk.“Dream”, counsels the visionary; “toil”,: 'Ebiroto', nibihumuriza ebiroto; 'kora munonga', counsels the laborer, but you must be both.
rk.Even in the depths of despondence, a day: Nobwokuba otaine matsiko, orunaku ruwabaho nirukuha ekyokwega. Turaho okushumbura byingi.
rk.Whatever Life gives you, even if it hurt: Amagara ekigari kukuha, nobukyirabe nikyishasha, oine kuguma Kandi oyorekye ngu origye. Ebishengye bigumire nibitengyeta kwonka tibiri kugwa.
rk.Life is a circle of happiness, sadness,: Omagara nigetorora aha kushemererwa, enaaku, amaganya ne biiro ebirungi. Wa ba noraba omu naaku zigugumire, gyira okwikyiriza ngu ebiro birungi biryonibyiza.
rk.Every struggle in your life has shaped y: Buri kiziibu kyori kurabamu omugara nikyikuhindura omuntu ogwe owoori eizooba eri, nahabwekyo siima aha bwe biziibu ebyo, ahakuba nibikugumya.
rk.Don’t give up, the beginning is always t: Otahwamu amaani, entandika nekyira kuba egumire.
rk.Good things come to those who believe, B: Ebirungi nibyizira abo abari kwikiriza, ebintu ebirungi nibyizira abo abaine obu gumisiriza. Ebintu ebiri kukyirayo oburungi nibyizira abo abatari kuhwamu amaani.
Okwehayo okuronda obuyambi nikyoreka amani gangye.
rk.Your first thought in the morning should: Ekyitekateko kyawe kyokubanza omukasheshe kyeine kuba "weebare
rk.Those who have a ‘why’ to live, can bear: Abo abeine ebibuzo ngu 'ahabwenkyi' okubaho, nibabasa kugumira naburikyimwe omungyeri 'yona  - Viktor E. Frankl
rk.”The grass is greener where you water it: Ebinyansi nebyekiragara ahori kwiteira amaizi." — Neil Barringham
rk.Live to inspire, and one day people will: Baho aha bwokugaruzamu amaani, Kandi eizooba rimwe abantu baryagyira, ahabwawe, tinda hanikyire.
rk.Particular food items such as - tea, cof: Emere yomuringo gumwe nka chai mukaru, chocolate, shukari, swit, soda, omwonyo mwinjyi, and ebirungo.
rk.Flashing or flickering lights: Ebitangaza ebiri kumyasamyasa ninga ebiri kwakayakana
rk.Very warm weather, hot baths or showers,: Okwosya kworu naku, okunaba amiizi garikwostya, namunonga habaho empindika yomubiri (okwostya).
rk.Watching TV and playing video games in a: Leeba Tivi hamwe nokureeba emizaano aha computa omukishengye kyawe ekyirikwaka kurungi, konka oyirire hareho na Tivi akaanya ka mita ibiri nekyichweeka (2.5 Metres) Kandi hakyiri ekyichweeka kya mita ( 0.5 metres) okuruga aha compuuta).
rk.Limiting the time spent in front of the: Okukyendeza obwire obwori kumara omumisho ga TV, computer, na masimu giturikukwata omungaron oba kwehara kuzana computer na video games.
rk.Using flicker-free monitors (LCD or flat: Okukozesa flicker-free monitors (LCD or flat screen).
rk.Using a remote control instead of walkin: Okukozesa rimooti (remote control) okukyira okutambura kuza hihi na TV  kuhindura omukutu.
rk.Adjusting Internet settings to control m: Okuhindura ebimwe aha nkora ya Internet okwehara ebishani birikutambura
rk.I love who I am and can not wait to see: Ninkunda ekyindi kandi, tinkarinda kureba ekyo ekyindabe.
rk.An aura is unusual feeling, experience,: Aura nikimanyisa okwehurira okutari kwabujyo, okworikwehurira, oba engyeri  yori kuhuriramu waba noza kogwa ensimbu.
rk.Was there a trigger for your seizure: Hariho ekya retaire ensimbu ku gigwa
rk.How did you feel after the seizure: Hariho ekya retaire ensimbu ku gigwa
